: : Hollywood : :

Hollywood smiles and then laughs.

Hollywood:  I don't k=
now, it's just fun to rip stuff.

-----------------------------------------=
---------------------------------------------
The preceding announcement ha=
s been paid for by the 
New World Order


  ----- Original Message ----- 

=
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 1=
6, 2002 7:58 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel=
 looks at Hollywood.

  Diesel: Dude, shirts? We're transformers...

  ****=
********************************************************
  The preceding ha=
s been paid for by the
  New World Order

    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, A=
ugust 16, 2002 7:42 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    : : Hollywood=
 : :

    Hollywood goes to rip his armor, but stops, as he had just repair=
ed it.

    Hollywood:  We really oughtta make our own shirts!...

    ----=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
-------
    The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
    New Wo=
rld Order


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 7:03 PM=

      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Razor : :

      Razor grab=
s a chunk of rick from the ground and crushes it in his metal hand.

      =
Razor: Yesssssssssssssssssssss!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

      **********************=
*********************************************
      The preceding has been =
paid for by the
      New World Order

        ----- Original Message -----=
 
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Se=
nt: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:55 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


=
        : : Sting/Hollywood : :

        Hollywood thinks about his Autobot=
 past.

        Hollywood:  Damn Maximals got what they deserved, brother!
=

        Sting:   They were shattered mercilessly by our awesome power.

  =
      Sting looks at the logo.

        Sting:  Indeed, our enemies shall b=
e crushed beneath our iron fist, and die knowing that their fate was decide=
d by the New World Order!...

        -------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------------------
        The preceding ann=
ouncement has been paid for by the 
        New World Order
          -----=
 Original Message ----- 
          From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:41 PM
          =
Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          : : Razor / Diesel ::

          D=
iesel: The Maximals tried to defend it, but the hanger and the Maximals the=
mselves were left in ruin.

          Razor had a wicked smile at this.

  =
        Razor: Ha ha. Stupid Maximals. You guys our great. Anyway a little =
bit of buisness. 

          Razor brings up the nWo logo on the computer s=
creen.

          Razor: We should all have this logo on us. I want our ene=
mies who know who destroys them!

          *******************************=
************************************
          The preceding announcement h=
as been paid for by the
          New World Order
            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: LurkerAbyss 
            To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:34 PM
            =
Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            : : Sting/Hollywood : :

       =
     Hollywood grins.

            Hollywood:  It's good to have you all he=
re, brothers!

            He nods at Razor.

            Hollywood:  We co=
uld use those parts.  Say, brother, that looks like a pretty high-tech ship=
.

            Sting:  Yeah, we pirated it from some Maximals.  At least, I=
 think they owned it.

            ----------------------------------------=
----------------------------------------------
            The preceding an=
nouncement has been paid for by the 
            New World Order
